property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature twists knots stronger than any rope.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It teaches you to play dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She is truly Wirewood's child now." - Elvish refugee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive." - Elvish refugee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most violent and destructive storms in Femeref occur on cloudless days.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the Tangle, the wurm tunnels stretch . . . wide as a stone's throw, long as forever, deep as you dare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Forest {2}: Enchanted Forest becomes a 4/4 green Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Forest is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Cedars from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his feet be so thirsty?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Untap all lands you control. • Until end of turn, lands you control become 2/2 creatures that are still lands. Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.value: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Flashback {2}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature dies, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bones of allies grant wisdom. The bones of enemies grant strength. The bones of dragons grant life eternal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}, {T}: Target player discards two cards. Activate only as a sorcery. Channel - {5}{B}{B}, Discard Ghost-Lit Stalker: Target player discards four cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." - Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to rats. Everything is simply another meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Graveyards are sacrilege! A waste of perfectly good bones." - Keren-Dur, necromancer lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.) Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Swamp {2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Swamp becomes a 2/2 black Spirit creature with "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land. When enchanted Swamp is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fens from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know I accept only one currency here, and yet you have sought me out. Why now do you hesitate?" - Xathrid demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the most ravenous soul feeds on the health of the weak.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Madness {3}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." - Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bigger they are, the faster they rot."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana developed a fondness for the moment when roaring becomes squealing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.
